document_data.name: Ibun Rensha
document_data.mainbody: '''Ibun Rensha''' was a member of the [[Rensha]] family of [[Calimshan]] who conquered [[Loudwater]] and much of the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the mid–12{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the [[1150 DR|Year of the Scourge, 1150 DR]], Ibun Rensha and several of his family led a mercenary army to [[northwest Faerûn]]. They took over Loudwater and laid claim to most of the Delimbiyr Vale,{{cite web/Legacy of the Green Regent/What is the Green Regent}} beginning a period known as the Rensha Rule.
